thread.title: Standard & Poor’s Affirms Ratings on India’s Debt at BBB-Minus
thread.title_full: Standard & Poor’s Affirms Ratings on India’s Debt at BBB-Minus - WSJ

author: Anant Vijay Kala
title: Standard & Poor’s Affirms Ratings on India’s Debt at BBB-Minus
text:
NEW DELHI—Standard & Poor’s on Monday reaffirmed its stable outlook on India’s BBB-minus long-term debt rating, saying the country’s external position is a source of strength for its credit profile although public finances are still weak.
“The outlook indicates that we do not expect to change our rating on India this year or next based on...
